idea-plugin.name: SnippetBundle
idea-plugin.description:
SnippetBundle helps you bundle selected project files into a single Markdown text (with safe fenced code blocks), so you can paste it into LLM web chats or other external tools easily.

Typical workflow

  1. Drag & drop files/folders into the tool window
  2. Click Copy Files (Markdown) to copy everything to clipboard

Features

  • Tool window to manage selected files
  • Drag & drop support
  • Markdown output with language fences and safe-fence handling
  • Default ignore rules and binary filtering
  • Clear all selections with one click
